data.name: Gladiators: Ludus Manager
data.detailed_description:
Gladiators: Ludus Manager


In Ludus Manager you will be managing a Ludus. Believe it or not that's not an easy task, feeding your gladiators and keeping them alive in battle requires effort.
In this game you will be playing as Fabius Festus, a Lanista, someone whose job is to manage a Ludus. Buying Slaves, Selling Them, hiring Doctors is all part of the
Management. Dont forget to train your Gladiator. And Beat all Arenas in the game until you eventually arrive in Rome. Winning favors with the Emperor is your ultimate task.

Features


  • Buy and Sell Slaves.
  • Upgrade Your Ludus.
  • Train your Gladiators.
  • Hire some Staff.
  • Do Covert Missions.
  • Pit Fights.
  • Armory.
  • Bazaar
  • Several Gladiators to choose from.
  • Visit The Slave Market.


Fabius Festus is a veteran gladiator whose purpose in life changed after winning the Rudiarius. Now he dreams into becoming a sucsessful Lanista.


Marius Cassius is a Senator that secretly seeks to gain the Emperor's personal favors.
